content.raw:
I managed to run the test after adding the `sha1` parameter to the jenkins job and specifying it when building manually:

* https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ros_gazebo_pkgs-ci-pr_any_kinetic-xenial-amd64/82/parameters/

The camera tests are passing:

* https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ros_gazebo_pkgs-ci-pr_any_kinetic-xenial-amd64/82/testReport/(root)/

I added the `sha1` parameter to the OSRFLinuxCompilationAnyGitHub.groovy dsl in this branch too; @\_jrivero_ I hope that looks ok
content.html:
I managed to run the test after adding the sha1 parameter to the jenkins job and specifying it when building manually:

  • https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ros_gazebo_pkgs-ci-pr_any_kinetic-xenial-amd64/82/parameters/

The camera tests are passing:

  • https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ros_gazebo_pkgs-ci-pr_any_kinetic-xenial-amd64/82/testReport/(root)/

I added the sha1 parameter to the OSRFLinuxCompilationAnyGitHub.groovy dsl in this branch too; @_jrivero_ I hope that looks ok
